data.title: Quiz Game
data.description: A full-stack quiz game application to help pass the time in quarantine. Utilizes a mySQL database, Node and Express, and the Materialize framework.

data.title: Team Profile Generator
data.description: A node application to generate a short summary of team members, their role, and their contact info

data.title: Travel Master
data.description: A travel application where users can learn more about the places they are visiting

data.title: Fitness Tracker
data.description: A full-stack workout tracking application that allows users to view, create, and track daily workouts. Utilizes MongoDB with Mongoose, Node and Express, and the Semantic UI

data.title: Budget Tracker
data.description: A financial tracking application that allows users to enter transactions with or without an internet connection. This app was built using NodeJS, Express, Mongoose and MongoDB, and Compression, using the Bootstrap framework

data.title: Note Taker
data.description: A To-Do List style application that allows users to write and save tasks to be performed, and delete tasks once they've been completed. Built using an Express backend and Bootstrap framework
